snippet: Josh Gatt, 21, has been one of the most highly rated young players in American soccer in recent years, and this week he could get his first cap for the United States national team.
abstract: Josh Gatt, 21, has been one of the most highly rated young players in American soccer in recent years, and this week he could get his first cap for the United States national team.

headline.main: For Josh Gatt, a Title in Norway and (Maybe) a Cap in Russia
